summary: 3-D animated-family adventure that tells the heart-warming, coming-of-age story of a man and his best-friend, a lovable and fearless dog named, Jock.
cast: Bryan Adams|Donald Sutherland|Helen Hunt|Ted Danson|Desmond Tutu|Mandy Patinkin|William Baldwin|Bongani Nxumalo|Theo Landey|Makenzie Hart|Jason Kennett|Michael De Pinna|Anthony Bishop|Robert Hobbs|Dianne Simpson|Sylvaine Strike|Michael Richard|Rose Emanuel|Louisa Cerdan|Philina Cerdan|Ava Flutie|Catherine Flutie|Kim Hart|Mallory Hart|Kira Karantonis|Kristy MacNeillie|Tammy MacNeillie|Luna Malyon|Jamie Samuels|Fenias Timbe
title: Jock
